ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with 900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS/EDGE data capabilities
3-inch touchscreen; 5-megapixel camera/camcorder with Schneider-Kreuznach optics and image stabilization
Bluetooth stereo music; digital audio player and FM radio; MicroSD memory expansion; organizer and document viewer
Up to 2.5 hours of talk time, up to 250 hours (10+ days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: LG KE990 Black Phone (Unlocked, Intl. Version) no U.S. Warranty
